skill_constraints: Single DevOps engineer creates a bottleneck in Sprints 12-13. Key person dependency on Tech Lead.
mitigation_strategies: Augment with DevOps contractor for 2 sprints; enforce cross-training for Odoo lead.

skill_constraints: Severe DevOps bottleneck will delay deployment and testing. No backup for key roles.
mitigation_strategies: Accept timeline delays; high risk of team burnout.
